text:
Marco Aurelio Denegri Santagadea (16 May 1938 – 27 July 2018) was a Peruvian intellectual, literature critic and sexologist. He made many important works to the linguistics of Spanish.
During the 1970s, Denegri was the director of the magazine "Revista Científica y Artística de Cultural Sexual - Fáscinum". Its first issue was published in April 1972. From 1997 to 2000 he hosted the TV show "A solas con Marco Aurelio Denegri" on cable channel Cable Mágico Cultural.
